description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在文化大革命结束后，时任中共中央主席华国锋奉行的政治原则，即“凡是毛主席作出的决策，我们都坚决维护；凡是毛主席的指示，我们都始终不渝地遵循”。
description.en: A political principle followed by Hua Guofeng, then Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, during his tenure after the Cultural Revolution in the People's Republic of China. It is generally summarized as 'we will resolutely uphold whatever policy decisions Chairman Mao made, and we will unswervingly follow whatever instructions Chairman Mao gave'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，文化大革命结束后曾任中共中央主席、国务院总理和中央军委主席，提出了“两个凡是”的执政原则。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, Premier of the State Council, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission after the Cultural Revolution. He is known for proposing the 'Two Whatevers' governing principle.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲东部的社会主义国家。 “两个凡是”是在该国文化大革命结束后出现的一个政治原则。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia. The 'Two Whatevers' was a political principle that emerged in the country after the end of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1966年至1976年间发生的一场重大政治运动。 “两个凡是”是在该运动结束后提出的。
description.en: A major political movement in the People's Republic of China from 1966 to 1976. The 'Two Whatevers' policy was proposed after this movement ended.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。“两个凡是”的核心是维护其生前的决策和指示。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army. The core of the 'Two Whatevers' was to uphold his decisions and instructions made during his lifetime.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，“凡是派”的主要成员之一，支持“两个凡是”原则。
description.en: A Chinese politician, one of the main members of the 'Whatever Faction', who supported the 'Two Whatevers' principle.

description.zh-cn: 指文化大革命结束后，以华国锋、汪东兴等人为首的坚持“两个凡是”原则的中共党内势力。
description.en: Refers to the faction within the CCP, led by figures like Hua Guofeng and Wang Dongxing, that adhered to the 'Two Whatevers' principle after the Cultural Revolution.

en: Publicity Department of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的宣传部门。
description.en: The propaganda department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1977年2月7日《人民日报》发表的社论，其中包含了“两个凡是”的经典表述。
description.en: An editorial published in the People's Daily on February 7, 1977, which contained the classic formulation of the 'Two Whatevers'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，受汪东兴指示组织撰写了提出“两个凡是”的社论《学好文件抓住纲》。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who, under the instruction of Wang Dongxing, organized the writing of the editorial 'Study the Documents Well and Grasp the Key Link', which proposed the 'Two Whatevers'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

zh-cn: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准
en: Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth

description.zh-cn: 1978年5月11日发表于《光明日报》的评论文章，引发了真理标准大讨论。
description.en: A commentary article published in Guangming Daily on May 11, 1978, which triggered the great discussion on the criterion of truth.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记。他审定了《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》一文的发表。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee. He reviewed and approved the publication of the article 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth'.

description.zh-cn: 1978年在中国思想理论界展开的一场大讨论，旨在批判“两个凡是”，确立实践是检验真理的唯一标准。
description.en: A major debate in China's ideological and theoretical circles in 1978, aimed at criticizing the 'Two Whatevers' and establishing that practice is the sole criterion for testing truth.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，改革开放的主要设计师。他反对“两个凡是”，并在十一届三中全会上对其进行了批评。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the chief architect of China's reform and opening-up. He opposed the 'Two Whatevers' and criticized the idea at the 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次重要会议，会上批评了“两个凡是”的思想，标志着拨乱反正和改革开放的开始。
description.en: An important meeting of the Communist Party of China where the ideology of the 'Two Whatevers' was criticized, marking the beginning of the 'Boluan Fanzheng' period and the Reform and Opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府（国务院）的最高领导人。
description.en: The head of government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1945年至1982年间的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The highest leading position of the Communist Party of China from 1945 to 1982.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会主席

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会的最高领导人，中国人民解放军的最高统帅。
description.en: The head of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China and the supreme commander of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 在其执政时期内奉行“两个凡是”原则，并在1976年10月26日首次提出。
description.en: He followed the 'Two Whatevers' principle during his tenure and first proposed it on October 26, 1976.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命的结束以及毛泽东的逝世，为华国锋提出和奉行“两个凡是”创造了政治背景。
description.en: The end of the Cultural Revolution and the death of Mao Zedong created the political context for Hua Guofeng to propose and implement the 'Two Whatevers'.

description.zh-cn: 被视为“凡是派”的首要人物。
description.en: Was considered the leading figure of the 'Whatever Faction'.

description.zh-cn: 被视为“凡是派”的首要人物之一。
description.en: Was considered one of the leading figures of the 'Whatever Faction'.

description.zh-cn: 指示李鑫组织撰写了社论《学好文件抓住纲》。
description.en: Instructed Li Xin to organize the writing of the editorial 'Study the Documents Well and Grasp the Key Link'.

description.zh-cn: 组织撰写了社论《学好文件抓住纲》。
description.en: Organized the writing of the editorial 'Study the Documents Well and Grasp the Key Link'.

description.zh-cn: 该社论的发表，使“两个凡是”成为广为人知的经典表述，并得到官方媒体的广泛宣传。
description.en: The publication of this editorial made the 'Two Whatevers' a widely known classic expression and it was extensively promoted by official media.

description.zh-cn: 刊登了社论《学好文件抓住纲》，使其内容得以广泛传播。
description.en: Published the editorial 'Study the Documents Well and Grasp the Key Link', allowing its content to be widely disseminated.

description.en: The great discussion on the criterion of truth aimed to criticize and negate the 'Two Whatevers' from an ideological and theoretical standpoint.

description.en: Criticism of the 'Two Whatevers' ideology was raised at the meeting, which was a key event in the political repudiation of this idea.

description.zh-cn: 因坚持“两个凡是”的错误，华国锋被迫先后辞去国务院总理、中共中央主席和中央军委主席的职务。
